0.heading: iMessage Application
0.description: iMessage app for TripCase, started as my Hackday project. Took to production in less than a week! This app lets a business traveller share his trip item via iMessage

1.heading: PDF Generation Cordova Plugin
1.description: PDF generation Cordova plugin for Receipt Capture feature picks up images stored in local storage to combine and generate PDF.

2.heading: Onboarding UI
2.description: Onboarding UI for TripCase was designed to improve the onboarding process for TripCase customers.

3.heading: Watch OS2 Upgrade
3.description: Upgrade project from Watch OS1 to OS2. Major challenges included maintaining OS1 compatibility and deprecating MMWormHole for OS2

4.heading: Sync status Cordova Plugin
4.description: Sync status plugin talks to the native SQLlite3 to add/modify/delete/fetch receipts data that need to be synced to/from AWS be synced to/from AWS be synced to/from AWS.

5.heading: Memory Mirror POC
5.description: Build a POC which demonstrated capturing Memory Mirror videos customers took in stores straight to their mobile application. Key functionality included dual video playback on the same screen.

6.heading: Wedding Venues commonplace
